Papers & Presentations


Research Projects and Papers

  1. Application of Deep Learning in Cartography using UNET and Generative Adversarial Network.

    Deep Gandhi, Govind Thakur, Prof.Pranit Bari, Prof. Khushali Deulkar
    Chapter 18 of "Design of Intelligent Applications using Machine Learning and Deep Learning Techniques" (Taylor and Francis)

  2. Music Genre Classification using Transfer Learning on log-based MEL spectrograms

    Jash Mehta, Deep Gandhi, Govind Thakur, Prof.Pratik Kanani.
    Proceedings of 5th International Conference on Computing Methodologies and Communication (Scopus Indexed), pp. 1101–1107, IEEE, 2021.

  3. Comparison of Sequential and Non-Sequential Models for Spanish to English Machine Translation.

    Deep Gandhi, Jash Mehta, Prof.Pranit Bari.
    Under review at 4th International Conference on Computational Intelligence and Data Engineering (ICCIDE-2021)

  4. Federated Learning for Brain Tumor Segmentation on Cloud

    Deep Gandhi, Jash Mehta, Nemil Shah, Dr.Ramchandra Mangrulkar.
    Accepted for publication as chapter 17 for the book "Cloud Computing Technologies for Smart Agriculture and Healthcare"

  5. Low Resource Language Processing and Opinion Mining on Hindi Text

    Deep Gandhi*, Jash Mehta*, Naitik Rathod, Prof.Sudhir Bagul.
    Under review at "The SIGNLL Conference on Computational Natural Language Learning (CoNLL), EMNLP 2021"

  6. Detection of Spear Phishing using Natural Language Processing

    Deep Gandhi, Jash Mehta, Dr.Ramchandra Mangrulkar.
    Accepted for the book "Cyber Security Threats and Challenges facing Human Life, CRC Press (Taylor and Francis)"

  7. Privacy based Approach for Emoji Detection in Low Resource Languages

    Deep Gandhi, Jash Mehta, Nirali Parekh, Karan Waghela.
    Ongoing Research Project
